transcript:
Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh abhi dusre call par vyast hai. Kripya pratiksha karein ya kuch samay paschat prayas karein. The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait or call again later.
Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh abhi dusre call par vyast hai.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, good morning.
Customer: Hello, haan ji, good morning.
Executive: Utkarsh bol raha hu.
Customer: Haan, arey Utkarsh kal pura IndiaMART mera woh band hai aur woh khul hi nahi rahi buylead wali aur aapka number bhi usme nahi aa raha hai. Toh mujhe woh ticket hi raise karni padi. Usme kuch nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Accha matlab woh app nahi open ho raha tha kya aapka?
Customer: Haan, app hi nahi open ho raha tha aur woh pata nahi crash hai crash hai aisa karke bata raha tha aur buylead nahi ho rahi thi. Purana sab ho raha tha open. Par jo mere ko buylead purchase karni hai woh nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Accha, ek minute mein aapka seller panel ek baar open kar le raha hu, bas dekh le raha hu.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Mobile pe aap open kar rahe the kya mam?
Customer: Haan, kya cheez?
Executive: Matlab mobile pe aap open kar rahe hoge na buylead wagera?
Customer: Haan, har baar mobile pe hi karti hu.
Executive: Ji, ji.
Customer: Toh phir woh hua hi nahi.
Executive: Accha, mein dekh leta hu. Aur maine screenshot bhi liya hua hai uska.
Customer: Uska?
Executive: Woh kal hi, haan ji ji, woh kal hua hoga aisa na, kuch matlab aisa technical kuch hua hoga aisa issue.
Customer: Haan, do teen se ho raha hai.
Executive: Accha, accha. Number toh, repairing kuch hoga pata nahi kya hai.
Customer: Haan, haan, haan.
Customer: Toh mujhe nahi samajh mein aaya.
Customer: Haan, abhi khul raha hai.
Executive: Accha, abhi, abhi khul raha hai.
Customer: Haan, theek hai mam.
Executive: Ji, buylead, buylead wagera aise consume wagera ho rahi hai, abhi check kariye mam.
Customer: Mein abhi check kar rahi hu.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Haan, hua.
Executive: Accha, hua hai, ho raha hai abhi buylead wagera.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Abhi just hua.
Executive: Ji, mein keh raha tha ek aapne thoda sa ek do minute ka thoda sa time de dijiye. Aapne product yaha pe na paraffin wax temple candle karke hai apna product.
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Haan, haan, mein wohi dekh rahi hu mein.
Executive: Yes mam, woh is product ko humne matlab inactive kar rakha hai toh usko kya hum delete kar rahe hai ki nahi deal kar rahe hai abhi?
Customer: Mein wohi ko search kar rahi hu, kya naam bataya aap?
Executive: Mam, paraffin wax temple candle karke hai, ₹10 per piece hai.
Customer: Haan, mein ek minute catalog view kar rahi hu, mujhe nahi dikh raha hai.
Executive: Product, product mein jaiye mam.
Customer: Hain?
Executive: Product mein jaiye product mein.
Customer: Product mein hi hu, usi ko dhund rahi hu.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan, woh apna ek product hai inactive hai.
Executive: Means jab aap manage product mein gaye honge na mam?
Customer: Haan, manage product mein hi hu mein.
Executive: Theek hai. Upar right hand side top pe dekhiye three dot honge.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Uspe click kariye.
Customer: Kari.
Executive: After that waha pe deactivated karke aa raha hoga, deactivate.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Deactivate pe click, haan, toh yeh apna product, deactivate hai.
Customer: Haan, yeh paraffin aa raha hoga na, aapka product dikh raha hoga apna.
Customer: Haan, mujhe dikh raha hai aur deactivate hai woh. Theek hai, woh deactivate hi rakhna hai.
Executive: Accha, ispe matlab deal nahi karte hai aap?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Toh ek kaam kariye na, isko aap delete kar dijiye. Wahi pe usi product pe click kariye mam, product ke name pe.
Customer: Ek second.
Executive: Yes mam, call pe hu aapke.
Customer: Haan, kiya.
Executive: Woh waha pe delete ka option aaya mam?
Customer: Nahi, delete ka nahi aa raha hai. Change photo ka aa raha hai.
Executive: Nahi, nahi mam, product ke name pe click kariye aap. Product ke name pe click karoge na mam, toh woh product ka name open ho jayega. Toh uspe phir three dot pe click karke delete karna hai mam.
Customer: Accha, phir nahi, toh bhi nahi aa raha hai. Ek second.
Executive: Ek baar, ek baar phir se kariye wahi pe. Product ke name pe hi click karna padega. Aap open karoge uski photo open ho ja rahi hogi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hmm, photo pe nahi, name pe click kariye.
Customer: Haan, aaya delete.
Executive: Accha, delete ka aaya mam abhi?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Kar diya.
Executive: Accha, delete ho gaya. Aur, aur, aur mam kaisi kya services chal rahi hai abhi?
Customer: Woh koi bhi buylead ko hai na convert nahi ho rahi hai Utkarsh. Aapko itne logo ka phone bhi mein kar rahi hu abhi toh.
Executive: Accha.
Executive: Hmm, hmm, hmm. Par abhi nahi ho raha hai woh.
Executive: Kya mam issue aa raha hai? Matlab lead wagera ka issue aa raha hai ki matlab quality?
Customer: Phone hi nahi lag raha hai na, phone nahi uth raha hai.
Executive: Yeh jitni bhi aap buylead pe consume kar rahe ho.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Yeh jaise aapne wooden decorative candle ki thi 15 tarikh ko castle ki, inme bhi phone nahi laga aapka mam?
Customer: Haan, woh nahi aa raha hai koi bhi.
Customer: Matlab dekho kal bhi maine phone kiya na, toh kal nahi. Matlab jo last, kal toh khul hi nahi raha tha.
Customer: Haan. Toh usne bola ki mere ko candle ki zarurat hi nahi hai.
Executive: Candle ki zarurat nahi hai.
Executive: Aap, aap matlab means na jo jaise aap turant karo, aap instant na mere ko matlab aapko maine last time aap mere ko na turant uska screenshot jaise hi aap kara karo. Abhi aap ek bari buylead pe jaiye, call pe reh ke hi aap call kariye.
Customer: Abhi kya karu mein?
Executive: Koi buylead consume kariye. Jaise ek aayi hai yaha pe mehndi art candle karke hai.
Customer: Haan, last time jo wali toh dekhi mein. Abhi just aapke rehte rehte hi ek buylead kari hu consume.
Executive: Hmm, hmm.
Customer: Haan na, kyunki woh tabhi toh mujhe pata chala par woh wohi hai. Yaar na column wali jo hai na woh maine ki hai par usme wapas dikh rahi hai.
Executive: Nahi, accha ruko mein. Abhi aapne kar li hai scented candle karke hai na Indore ki?
Customer: Haan, but woh mujhe.
Executive: Indore ki hai.
Customer: Nahi, nahi, nahi, mujhe mere paas woh wapas dikh rahi hai. Matlab maine click kiya tha but mujhe nahi dikh rahi hai.
Executive: Accha ji aapke 19 mam aap na jo buylead dekho aapko mein batata hu, aap jo buylead consume karte ho na, aap kitne hour ki karte ho?
Executive: Jo jaise abhi aap recent pe jao, aap recent pe jaiye.
Customer: Abhi maine, maine 10 minute wali bhi ki hai, aap dekhna ek baar. Woh 10 minute wali bhi li hai. Par yeh kyun nahi dikh rahi hai mujhe? Jo maine li Indore ki, ab dikhi dekho.
Executive: Yeh aapne ki hai abhi yaha pe mere ko dikh rahi hai. Aapne abhi just kari hai.
Customer: Haan, kal ki hai na, dekho 17 November ki maine li hai, hai na?
Executive: 17 November wali aapne li.
Customer: Haan, usne li thi na, usne mere ko yeh bola hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Yeh, yeh keh raha hai, humein nahi chahiye.
Executive: Accha, accha. Aap na jo, suno ek baat, isko na baklawa chahiye, bolo.
Executive: Kya chahiye mam?
Customer: Ek kunaafa aur baklawa chahiye.
Executive: Accha, accha, accha.
Executive: Aap, aap na mam ek pattern aap change kariye. Aap na abhi jaise aapne jo bola na do din pehle ki buylead consume kari thi na 17 tarikh wali aap keh rahe ho.
Customer: Nahi, nahi, woh toh 17 tarikh ko consume kari thi, aaj thodi kari hai maine.
Executive: Tabhi nahi kari hai. Do din toh band hi tha na IndiaMART, chal hi nahi raha tha.
Executive: Haan, haan, ji, ji, do nahi chal raha tha. Abhi aap, abhi mere call pe reh ke aap jao zara buylead pe jaiye recent pe. Abhi koi consume kariye isko call kariye mere call pe reh ke hi.
Customer: Yeh, yeh jo hai na Rajat Rathore ko maine woh kiya hai. Char piece. Theek hai?
Executive: Hmm, hmm.
Customer: Aur woh Bilaspur ka hai.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: Haan na, woh phone nahi utha raha. Anirudh hai woh Bilaspur ka hi hai, hamari city ka hai.
Customer: Usne bhi phone nahi uthaya hai.
Executive: Woh aapne kab call kiya tha unko? Parso kiya tha call mam?
Customer: Haan, 17 tarikh ko.
Executive: Accha, 17 tarikh ko kiya tha. Ek baar inko woh, accha ek minute suno, ek hai kunaafa and baklawa castle ki hai.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: 20-20 chahiye usko, kunaafa chahiye, baklawa chahiye, uske liye mujhe aaya hai.
Executive: Accha. Bak, baklawa matlab kya matlab hota hai, samjhe nahi thoda sa.
Customer: Mithai hai woh.
Executive: Accha, accha, accha, segment hai aur apna kaam nahi hai.
Customer: Mithai ka kaam nahi hai na, candle.
Executive: Haan, wohi cheez hai.
Executive: Phir yeh jo hai Khargar, Khargagar ka hai, ek dekhiye. Ishwari hai, usko maine kaunsi tarikh ko li thi? 15 November ko li thi. Hai na? Khargar.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Woh usne bhi phone nahi uthaya.
Executive: Mam, aapko mein ek cheez batata hu, jaise aap abhi buylead pe jaiye, buylead pe. Jo aapka is waqt buylead pe abhi jaiye mam, aapko practically dikha raha hu jo aap bata rahe ho. Buylead pe jaiye aap.
Customer: Haan. Hu buylead pe. Wapas, theek hai, recent pe jaiye.
Customer: Recent mein hi hu.
Executive: Theek hai. Ek apna na Roman candle karke hai, teen ghante pehle Maharashtra ki hai, theek hai? Toh usme aap, usme aap jab check karoge na mam, toh niche na ek likha hota buyer also viewed. Usme kuch requirement aur bhi dekhi hui hoti hai. Toh aap usko consume mat kara karo aap. Aap abhi jo Roman candle hai teen ghante pehle aayi hai buylead.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Uske niche dekhiye buyer also viewed. Waha pe aur bhi kuch product dekha hua hota hai na usne toh waha pe woh dikhata hai. Toh woh buylead aap consume mat kara karo.
Customer: Kyun?
Executive: Matlab agar uski requirement aur kuch hui hoti na toh waha pe dikhati hai. Isliye keh raha hu. Jaise apna dekho flower candle hai Surat Gujarat ki, theek hai? Toh usko dekho candle ki hi requirement hai exactly. Ab apna pehla aapko dikha raha hu henna mehndi art candle yeh hai apna kaam hai, yeh toh hai na mam?
Customer: Haan, hai na.
Executive: Haan, henna mehndi inhone aapka catalog bhi inhone dekha hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Inhone aapka catalog bhi properly dekha hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Toh aap, aap yeh buylead consume kar lijiye mam.
Customer: Maine kar li, usko message bhi kar diya hai.
Executive: Haan, message bhi kar diya, ab isko call kar lena mam ek bari.
Executive: Isko call kar lena aap aur jaise hoga aap mere ko turant number aap mera save kar lijiye na, maine message toh aapko kiya tha.
Customer: Haan, theek hai.
Executive: Mam number save kar lijiye aur ek bari agar aapko pura din mein time ho na thoda sa ek bari mam please ek baar matlab us baar humne matlab ek month pehle, do month pehle kiya tha, theek hai video meeting. Ek, ek bari agar aap aaj aa jayenge thoda sa better rahega matlab.
Customer: Haan, theek hai.
Executive: Haan, baki mein is concern ko alag close kar du jo aapka tha yeh matlab buylead wala jo open nahi ho raha tha mam.
Customer: Haan, theek hai mam, kar dijiye. Open nahi ho raha tha buylead.
Executive: Kya mam?
Customer: Woh kyun nahi ho raha tha?
Executive: Mam, shayad ho sakta hai kuch technical glitch ho gaya ho aapke side se open nahi ho pa raha ho waha se. Kyunki idhar se toh mein portal mein jaise mam aapka bhi mein profile check karta hu, open nahi karta rehta hu ki kaisa kya views kar rahe hai toh idhar pe open ho raha tha. Shayad woh na open ho paya ho.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Kuch aisa technical hoga issue is wajah se mam nahi ho paya. Kabhi kabhi udhar se network issue kuch bhi matlab kuch bhi reason ho sakte hai aise.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai mam. Mein aapko abhi message kar deta hu phir se WhatsApp mein ek bari.
Customer: Haan, theek hai. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- App was not opening, buyleads not loading.

- Unable to convert buyleads into sales.

- Customer needs kunaafa and baklawa.



Resolution:

- Executive helped delete inactive product.

- Advised customer on consuming relevant buyleads.

- Suggested customer to call the leads.

- Asked customer to save number for immediate assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a WhatsApp message.

- Customer will call the leads.

- Customer will try to schedule a video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, app issue, product deletion, sales conversion
